description: This Dart file is the main entry point of a Flutter application for a tic-tac-toe frontend. It sets up the app with a Material design theme, defines the main widget (MyApp), and displays a simple scaffold with a centered message and a progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A stateless widget that builds the root of the application, setting theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A stateful widget that represents the main page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage, builds the UI including an AppBar and a centered message with a progress indicator.

methods.name: main
methods.description: The application's entry point that runs the app.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for MyApp and _MyHomePageState.
